summary: Over the 6‑hour window winds were moderate and steady (mean ~5.4 m/s, std ~1.1) with a brief high-speed spike up to 21.3 m/s. Power output remained low but relatively stable (mean ~0.1545, std ~0.0794) with a consistent negative residual (~-0.084), one side of the drivetrain showed little speed variability while the generator-side speed fluctuated substantially (~76.6), pitch averaged slightly negative (~-1.2), yaw misalignment averaged ~9.8°, temperature was ~46°C, and no non‑normal statuses were reported.
